name: Repeated word matching
description: Matches a word that is repeated 3 or more times
content:
a a - must be at least 3 times
a b c - must all be different
z z z

hello hello hello hello.

potato, potato, potato, potato or potato - unfortunately seperator must be only one character.  This can be fixed, but it's not pretty
potato,potato,potato,potato, or potato 

lines lines lines
lines
^works over multiple lines^
